## Parser.parseSlots() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

ParseSlots converts payload to claim slots using provided schema

**Signature:**

```typescript
parseSlots(credential: W3CCredential, schemaBytes: Uint8Array): ParsedSlots;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  credential | [W3CCredential](./js-sdk.w3ccredential.md) | Verifiable Credential |
|  schemaBytes | Uint8Array | JSON schema bytes |

**Returns:**

[ParsedSlots](./js-sdk.parsedslots.md)

`ParsedSlots`
